name: d3-timelines
description: A d3 v4 version of timeline. Can display single bar timelines, timelines with icons, and timelines that pan.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-timelines.js -- index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-timelines.js -c -m -o build/d3-timelines.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-timelines.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-timelines.js build/d3-timelines.min.js
